vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » ISS - IPIPEIF Config API

Configuration parameters of dark frame subtraction / wide dynamic range block. More...

#include <vps_cfgipipeif.h>

Detailed Description

Configuration parameters of dark frame subtraction / wide dynamic range block.

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::afe

WDR Merge parameter. Exponential part of value in weight calculation 5 bits unsigned value

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::afm

WDR Merge parameter. Mantissa part of value in weight calculation 16 bits signed value

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::bf

WDR Merge parameter. Q0.15 BF * 2 ^ -16 * 2 ^ -5 0 - 15 (16)bits are used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::dst

Down shift value, after WDR merge. Range 0x0 to 0xF

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::enable

TRUE configure for WDR merge operation. In Addition to configuring this as TRUE isifOutCfg.inpSrc1 should be equals to ISSHAL_IPIPEIF_ISIF_OUT_WDR_DFS. OR ipipeOutCfg.inpSrc2 should be equalsto ISSHAL_IPIPEIF_IPIPE_OUT_WDR_DFS.

FALSE Configures for Dark frame subtraction. Currently not supported. In addition to configuring this as FALSE, isifOutCfg.inpSrc1 should NOT be ISSHAL_IPIPEIF_ISIF_OUT_WDR_DFS. OR ipipeOutCfg.inpSrc2 should NOT be ISSHAL_IPIPEIF_IPIPE_OUT_WDR_DFS.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::glong

WDR Merge parameter. Gain parameter to be applied for long frame. 0 - 15 (16) bits are used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::gshort

WDR Merge parameter. Gain parameter to be applied for short frame. 0 - 15 (16) bits are used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::lbit

Shift up value for long exposure frame. Range 0x0 to 0x7

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::lbk00

Black level for long exposure. Applied to even pixel on even line. 13 bits used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::lbk01

Black level for long exposure. Applied to odd pixel on even line. 13 bits used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::lbk10

Black level for long exposure. Applied to event pixel on odd line. 13 bits used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::lbk11

Black level for long exposure. Applied to odd pixel on odd line. 13 bits used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::lwb[FVID2_BAYER_COLOR_COMP_MAX]

Long Exposure White balance for pixels. 13 bits used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::mad

Adaptive filter, threshold config 16 bits are used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::mas

Adaptive filter, slope config 16 bits are used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::mergeClip

Post merger clip threshold

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::mergeShift

Post merger divide factor

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::sbit

Shift up value for short exposure frame. Range 0x0 to 0x7

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::sbk00

Black level for short exposure. Applied to even pixel on even line. 13 bits used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::sbk01

Black level for short exposure. Applied to odd pixel on even line. 13 bits used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::sbk10

Black level for short exposure. Applied to event pixel on odd line. 13 bits used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::sbk11

Black level for short exposure. Applied to odd pixel on odd line. 13 bits used.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::swb[FVID2_BAYER_COLOR_COMP_MAX]

Short Exposure White balance for pixels. 13 bits used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::thr

Threshold value. 0 - 15 (16) bits are used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::wdrDir

TRUE configures WDR block to expect long exposure frame from MEMIF and short exposure from VPORT. FALSE configures WDR block to expect long exposure frame from VPORT and short exposure from MEMIF. DFSDIR

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifWdrCfg::wgt_sel

Select long / short frame for weight calculation. TRUE uses short frame FALSE uses long frame. Breaking coding guide lines, in order to maintain name similar to spec.
